articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: Swiggy expands its street food vendors initiative to 125 cities - Entrackr
articles.description: After a successful pilot, foodtech major Swiggy has expanded its street food vendors program to 125 cities. The initiative under PM Street Vendor’s AtmaNirbhar Nidhi or PM SVANidhi Scheme is meant to help street vendors to grow their business which was severe…

articles.title: Burger King supplier Mrs Bectors Food's IPO to open on December 15 - Mint
articles.description: Price band of Mrs Bectors Food IPO has been fixed at  ₹286 to  ₹288 per share. .Bids can be made for a minimum of 50 equity shares
articles.content: The IPO of biscuit maker Mrs Bectors Food Specialities will open on December 15 and close of December 17. Price band of the 540 crore IPO has been fixed at 286 to 288 per share. Bids can be made for … [+1949 chars]
